channel.title: opinion on The Carmine Zaccagnino Blog
channel.description: Recent content in opinion on The Carmine Zaccagnino Blog

item.title: The Early Adopter Conundrum and Reacting to Comments
item.description: When you love new stuff but don’t really want to lose old stuff you write this kind of stuff. It’s about tech stuff that’s old and tech stuff that’s new.

item.title: Google's Flutter Framework Could Change Software Forever
item.description: Google is known for moonshot projects. Often they’re just that, without much hope of being brought to fruition in the near future.
